course.subject: LANG
course.name: English for University Studies I
course.description: The course aims to develop students' proficiency in English as well as their academic literacy skills, so that they can cope with the linguistic demands of studying through the medium of English. The course aims to develop students' competence in academic writing and their ability to engage in oral interaction in social and academic contexts. For students under the four-year degree curriculum.
course.exclusions: IELTS - Band 7 or above in overall and Band 6.5 or above in each part of the test or equivalent

reviews.author: gotoschoolbybus
reviews.title: 入得I班仲想走?
reviews.comment_content:
上堂內容主要係圍繞你D功課
都係教下你應該要點做你份功課
但係就真係唔係可以學到好多野
同埋
上堂氣氛極差
DEAD AIR 極多
reviews.comment_teaching:
冷場極多
根power point講
其實學唔到D咩
reviews.comment_grading:
點都係C RANGE 唔洗擔心
所以可能其他instructor會好D
reviews.comment_workload:
同其他班做既野一樣
都係有小小煩
同埋其實都多多地 D DEADLINE要小心
如果唔係唔記得做又要扣分

reviews.author: Forn
reviews.title: gamechanger
reviews.comment_content: 同其他LANG 1002 既班一樣， 教writing skills 寫essay，同 背誦vocab 等等，其他班會做佢都會做曬。課程内容冇咩得着，上咗好使冇上咁樣。
reviews.comment_teaching: 跟powerpoint 教，有discussion 同 presentation。冷場極多。
reviews.comment_grading: 大部分人都C range 或以下，killer comfirmed. 見到佢請立即swap 走.
reviews.comment_workload: 同LANG1002A，LANG1002S 一樣，vocab test ， essay，同ELPA. Workload唔算重。

reviews.author: latersindesign
reviews.title: KILLER
reviews.comment_content:
同其他LANG 1002 既班一樣， 教writing skills 寫essay，同背vocab，
但上堂氣氛極差，DEAD AIR 極多，上咗好使冇上咁樣。
reviews.comment_teaching: 跟power point 教，有discussion 同 presentation，學唔到D咩。
reviews.comment_grading: 點都係below C RANGE 停課個計分又唔知點 個個都係C-同D 見到佢即swap 走!!!!!!!!!!
reviews.comment_workload:
vocab test
essay
最緊要小心DEADLINE
Workload唔算重

reviews.author: Kin0807
reviews.title: Garbage
reviews.comment_content: Exactly following the powerpoint which is useless basically. Asking for the group discussion, then skipping comment on what students did.
reviews.comment_teaching: No teaching skills are valuable to be mentioned. Boring and sucks. Basically a killer. He didn't put any expectations or enthusiasm on his teaching. Every class just repeating what the powerpoint shows
reviews.comment_grading: How dare you to expect a good grade from a killer?  For everyone who used to good at writing and speaking in their high school eventually gets 3-4 marks on this course because of this guy.
reviews.comment_workload: As much as the other class

reviews.author: leonleon
reviews.comment_content: 正常英文課程，教番1002果本書，無特別，教apa, essay 果d skillls.
reviews.comment_teaching: 唔係太好，跟書讀。無咩特別，自己都可以學。
reviews.comment_grading: 全班D grade 左，有d 人F 左，之後再讀番撞番同一個人，最後D番。知係佢教就記得swap走。英文vocab learning mark 全0
reviews.comment_workload: 應該大部份人都知workload 係點 都係 essay ＋ present

reviews.author: yhtangab
reviews.title: 唔係得C range!!
reviews.comment_content: 跟書教，主要都係Speaking同Writing。I班主要都係英文底子較差，真係要好比心機讀。識多啲Academic Writing嘅Vocab，同pronunciation做好啲，呢啲全部都係靠自己。
reviews.comment_teaching: 跟書教，Toni每次教完都會早落堂。
reviews.comment_grading: 一開始Speaking同Writing Tasks都係4,5左右，後尾篇essay認真寫，用晒Academic Writing嘅字眼，每句都係complex sentence，所有嘢書都有教，認真睇，睇完多運用，多得呢篇essay拎咗3條6。加上我Vocab都好比心機溫，拎到 33/40 。最後總分75%左右，B+ 咗。
reviews.comment_workload: 學期前好輕鬆，好彩Toni一直提醒我哋要提早做晒啲嘢，提早溫Vocab，學期中後啲midterm係咁嚟，要分配好時間，因為Essay, vocab test 同2nd speaking task都係兩個禮拜內，仲未計其他courses，一定要留番啲時間。

reviews.author: Dr_ag0n
reviews.comment_content:
(first speaking task) you have to hand out a video clip no more than 3 minutes
(second speaking task) game changer that you need to present about 3.5-4 minutes.
(first writing task) you will be given 40 minutes to finish one paragraph of game changer in the class. 150-180 words
(second writing task) you have to finish 600-800 words article about game changer. your grade will be penalized if words more than 800 or less than 600.
(vocabulary test) you have to memorize 120 words. you have to attend the vocabulary test, or you will get 0. round 15% of this course.
reviews.comment_teaching: You can't learn anything in this course
reviews.comment_grading:
you will find that you use the most time to do the homework of this course, but you will get the worst result compared to other courses.
moreover, the curve will be with the students whose English is their first language. The grade is very unfair.
You will see the maths course will separate the different level of students. for instance, MATH 1012, MATH 1013, MATH 1023. You are supposed to get bad grade if you are in LANG 1002 I.
reviews.comment_workload:
very high.
two speaking tasks
two writing tasks
vocabulary test

reviews.author: Cloris li
reviews.comment_content:
Quite boring (Grammar, APA format, speaking skills, reading skills, case study)
Every lesson has a discussion part that is a variant of the whole lesson.
reviews.comment_teaching: Interesting, He would try to add more interesting and common examples and ideas to us. It helps to memorize all the skills and vocab more easily.
reviews.comment_grading:
good! I got a B+ range.
overall: 89/100
I don't understand how to distinguish the grading
reviews.comment_workload:
normal
speaking discussion, assignment and test (writing and listening)
The test seems IETLS. That just a general writing and general speaking topic

reviews.author: Edwin-the Eddy
reviews.comment_content:
Mostly having group discussion that you need to move your seats to allow Ming to approach you and others for assessing your performance. When your pronunciation got wrong, he corrected yours.

It had better not  sidetrack the topic or your task, he disliked that and gave us little preaches which l thought some of them are somewhat right.
reviews.comment_teaching:
nice. He will inform you of what need to be prepared or are going to do next time. He tried to make jokes/fun of someone or shared his past experience sometimes.

He asked open-end questions for us to interact

Don’t ask how to get good mark eg if l use xxx , can l get high grade ,or ask him to polish your work. The instructors are not accountable for it.

In short, a generous instructor who won’t give you good grade easily
reviews.comment_grading:
Pls attend all lessons

There were 2 mandatory videotaping group discussions within around 15 min for grade, which you can bring written paper but it had better recite it than follow it to read owing to the fact that your group mates (assigned by Ming) have views differed from yours. Thus it had better be a responsive and flexible guy to chat with others.

1 individual self-speech that Ming provided you a topic and you got 2-3min to prepare with paper he gave. You got a few min to finish the speech. After that, he asked you questions regarding the topic and you can briefly reply

1 writing test of about 500 wds in 50 min or so

Choose 2 electives you prefer
reviews.comment_workload:
Heavy amount as long as you have other assignment from different courses.

You need to write essays, do grammar exercises, prepare script for in-class discussions…

reviews.author: Wai Ching
reviews.title: Performance among every aspect was dispersed
reviews.comment_content:
The course was divided into three units, yet they were vague that there were not any specific focus for each unit.

Although the course tried to use everyday life as each unit, it's not fun. There were too many group discussions which was equivalent to chit-chatting very often, depending on which classmates you were assigned to. Perhaps for an I class, more than half of the students  were kinda laid back which intensified the not-to-learn ambience. Yeah there were students that was active, but many of them formed a large group just for chit-chatting. A minor and only benefit was the relationship between students was close. Despite, the content was bullshit for everyday English but homework and assessments.

Maybe the only thing I learnt is the useful vocabulary for everyday life.
reviews.comment_teaching:
Liza tried to teach the content in detail that I could not help praising. Yet the poor content for everyday English undermined her teaching. Despite she added plenty useful phrases and her valuable experiences in her daily life. Those phrases were easy to memorise and understand. Besides she was willing to answer my confusions related to grammar and vocabularies. Thumbs up from me!

She was sensitive with regard to disturbances. Even if you wanna chitchat, be as quiet as you can!
reviews.comment_grading:
Self-learning:15%
Discussion:20%
Portfolio:35%
Language Proficiency Assessment:30%

The grading was neither lenient nor strict.

Self-learning: a)Completion:7/7
b) Participation:3/3

Discussion:a)Language Accuracy:3/5
b) Language Use:3.5/5

Portfolio:a)Substance:3.5/5
b)Coherence:3.5/5
c)Being an effective learner:3/5

Language Proficiency Assessment:
1. Speaking Test: a)Spoken Language:3.5/5
b)Substance:3/5
c)Coherence:3/5

2. Writing Test: a) Written Language:3/5
b) Substance:3.5/5
c) Coherence:3/5

That was a mediocre performance. The final grade was B- which was kinda acceptable for LANG course
reviews.comment_workload:
Self-learning assignments(with SDL indicated) were required before each lessons mostly. It was easy to forgot the deadlines. Fortunately Liza will remind us weekly several days before each class.

Every class required group discussion, yet many of us did not prepare before class since they were not graded. For assessments, it would be impractical to improve our English rapidly. Basically nothing to prepare for both Discussion and Language Proficiency Assessment. So the overall workload is moderate( Portfolio and Self-learning). Portfolio is two pieces of writing while Self-learning is completing simple tasks.

reviews.author: Alex22
reviews.title: My First C Range
reviews.comment_content:
一般中學英文堂內容
無咩特別 好悶
唔好期待學到任何新嘢
reviews.comment_teaching:
無特別教過任何野
上堂十次訓九次
reviews.comment_grading:
入得i班先袋個C
條友算好俾我C+
i班十個九個killer
唔好reg到9點就ok
reviews.comment_workload:
一般
兩篇文
一篇300字
一篇550字
外加平時一堆浪費時間嘅自習功課
付出嘅時間絕對唔會比其他3cred course少

reviews.author: Ahting
reviews.comment_content:
Speaking(passion ,game changers)
Writing(game changers)
Vocabulary test(3 test 40words)
reviews.comment_teaching: The instructor is kind and willing to teach.  He was patient to point out students' mistakes and provided specific comments for student to improve.
reviews.comment_grading:
1st Speaking task + 2 個reflection: 10% + 5%
Essay writing process + writing task: 15% + 30%
2nd speaking task: 20%
Vocabulary learning: 20%
It was difficult to get high grade because most of the student in 1002I have a poor english skill compare to 1002S and 1002A
reviews.comment_workload:
The workload was heavy
2 speaking tasks , 1 writing task and 3 vocab tests
Need to make a good time management to finish those tasks.

reviews.author: Tim_
reviews.comment_content:
Online delivery mode with some unimportant textbook content and several speaking, writing assessments.

More importantly, LANG1002 require 80% of attendance. So, you may not able to skip too many classes no matter how boring the class is.
reviews.comment_teaching:
Alfred is a kind and patient person. You could ask him any question about the requirement of the assessment and he would always be patient to explain it.

I believe that Alfred is doing a good job of keeping the grading transparent. For every assessment, Alfred would give clear instructions and examples to let you know the strictness of the assessment is.
reviews.comment_grading:
Essay:4, 4, 5 (full mark: 7)+ 1 bonus mark
Speaking task 1: 4, 4 (full mark: 4)
Speaking task 2: 5, 5, 5 (full mark: 7)
Vocal learning record: 4 (full mark: 4)

Total: B+

Alfred is the best for sure. If I get another chance, without any hesitation, I would still register in Alfred's LANG1002 classes.
reviews.comment_workload: Light workload

reviews.author: Kenny_C
reviews.title: 坐等C range啦
reviews.comment_content:
Speaking(passion,game changers)
Writing(game changers)
Vocab(3次 40個字 識查字典就做到)
沒exam沒quiz
reviews.comment_teaching:
nice既 但D grade唔nice囉
要你開cam比下反應咁
reviews.comment_grading:
Speaking(passion) 10% + reflection 5%
Essay topic proposal 15% + writing 30%
Speaking(game changers) 20%
Vocabulary learning: 20%
仲望 係C架喇(聽講有人B到既)
唔好absent 好似一個sem最多4-5日
reviews.comment_workload: 沒workload,做好speaking,writing同vocab就好 平均2-3個星期先做一份野.

reviews.author: Ustrubbishgrade
reviews.comment_content: Boring.
reviews.comment_teaching: He was a kind teacher and willing to teach but he did not provide a good guideline to teach us to finish the essay and speech. Apart from that, he seldom gave detailed feedback.
reviews.comment_grading:
He was not lenient in grading. He gave me a C range. He was harsh in giving grade.  He did not give full mark in vocabulary learning records and writing  process.

In spring sem, I rose to S stream of 1003. I got B+ eventually. So I think the grading of 1002 was utterly bad.
reviews.comment_workload:
The workload was very big.
3 minutes video
3 annoying vocabulary learning records.
Having a speech and essay of game changer.

reviews.author: suren
reviews.title: Common Core course
reviews.comment_content: 常規英語教學，因為這個sem是online mode，包括APA的格式，個人短講，vocabulary learning，etc.
reviews.comment_teaching: Mr. TSANG 好好人，會一步一步教做assignment，好耐心，給分都几鬆手。
reviews.comment_grading: Mr. TSANG 給分都几鬆手，Eassy 545 Speaking一個23（4分滿分） 一個545（7分滿分）最後拎到B+  都幾靚龜
reviews.comment_workload: 都算輕鬆，得一篇完整的essay，兩次speaking,沒什麼workload。

reviews.author: TimC
reviews.title: Shit grade anyway
reviews.comment_content:
Speaking and writing
But actually I learnt nothing at all expect some grammars.
reviews.comment_teaching:
The instructor was nice
He encouraged all of us to speak English.
Also he explained grammar rules very clearly
reviews.comment_grading:
In general, students of I class were poor English skill
So you should not expect you will get high grades in this courses
reviews.comment_workload:
The workload was acceptable
2 oral assessments and 2 writing assessments.
Also 1 vocabulary test.
Apart from those assessments, also the instructor arranged some presentations from few sentences to 2-3 minutes every lesson but they were easily prepared.

reviews.author: potato 3
reviews.comment_content: LANG1002 is a task-based, integrated-skills, English language course. The course is designed to raise language proficiency and equip with the underlying competence. You will develop your ability to use English to communicate appropriately and effectively in this course.
reviews.comment_teaching:
Instructor is a nice and funny instructor. He makes the lessons funny.
He will go through the criteria of the grading with you before the deadline of those assignments. This, follow his suggestions and the guideline. He is a instructors focusing on skills. He will ask students to finish those works in group
in the lesson
reviews.comment_grading:
1st Speaking Task 15%
2nd Speaking Task 20%
1st Writing Task 10%
2nd Writing Task 30%
1st Vocabulary Learning 5%
2nd  Vocabulary Learning 10%
Participation 10%
reviews.comment_workload:
Two vocab tests, two speaking tasks and two writing tasks.
This course doesn't have mid-term and exam.
Some instructors may have assigned homework which need to finish every week.

reviews.author: 鐫仔
reviews.title: Lang1002i
reviews.comment_content: 普普通通學下寫speech 用reference咁 主要都係寫文 game changer 咁 都佔30-40% first and second writing task 唔算太多野做
reviews.comment_teaching: 無咩特別 幾nice 用心教 又唔會逼學生做好多out class preparation 上堂愉快 無咩壓力 但唔係成日講到做功課的重點 點攞高分 專心聽同問
reviews.comment_grading: 好好 有b- 我以為一定得C range 我目標係C+ 但第一二task食左個34 之後vocal 10/20 心諗死得 應該C-/C 我d fd都覺得我最多C C+都無咩機會 但之後writing 2 攞全5 speaking全4 vocal 22.5/40 心諗應該最多攞到C+ 覺得無機會攞b range 點知出到B-開心死 比預期既C高出唔少 應該個tutor比分好 大半班人都有C+ 成日聽日講D range I班 都唔係
reviews.comment_workload: 無咩workload 做好平時assignment 就得 最多d搵人改文

reviews.author: 9upper
reviews.title: 你見到呢個I班就知你連B range都唔會有
reviews.comment_content:
唔好預你係呢個course學到咩英文，堂上只係睇下youtube,吹下咁。成日叫你講下故仔。自問因為I班大家都英文都好差。上堂氣氛唔多好。1002 好似主要係speaking，感覺上。

Vocab test好難，有時溫完都係得個吉。
reviews.comment_teaching: 每次上堂之前都會播下D舊既英文歌，都幾好聽既，等你地輕鬆下。上堂吹下水有時都幾開心下。其實佢有熱誠教既，但可能大家真係太懶英文差又唔想改善，上堂又講下野，得佢一個人講，有次發火HI 我地，見到火到佢紅都面哂。
reviews.comment_grading: 肯肯定C range 利申 C左，算係咁。呀mike係其他I班 D左一半人。
reviews.comment_workload:
無咩功課(其他班會有),即使叫左你做你唔做佢都唔會check

1000字 essay
5mins 既video
presentation 5mins

reviews.comment_content:
上堂內容主要係圍繞你D功課
都係教下你應該要點做你份功課
但係就真係唔係可以學到好多野
同埋
上堂氣氛極差
DEAD AIR 極多
reviews.comment_teaching:
根power point講
其實學唔到D咩
reviews.comment_grading:
點都係C RANGE 唔洗擔心
所以可能其他instructor會好D
reviews.comment_workload:
同其他班做既野一樣
都係有小小煩
同埋其實都多多地 D DEADLINE要小心
如果唔係唔記得做又要扣分

reviews.author: 3737quentin
reviews.title: Yr1同學嘅Honeymoon
reviews.comment_content:
主要有兩個unit
Unit 1: people, passion possible
Unit 2: Game changers
附送22篇reading passage 連題目答案 、 listening練習同埋一啲instructions
上堂只係著重教unit 1 、2，其他自己去複習。task就其實唔太關課本事，更重要嘅係你點樣學到書入邊嘅句式、技巧，然後再去應用，唔係俾啲死背書嘅人讀，係俾啲一係理解能力高，一係啲英文底高但無考試緣嘅人讀。
reviews.comment_teaching:
非常之鐘意Ming sir 嘅教法。Lang係好沉悶，亦都可以好有趣，好玩。我覺得佢又唔係完全跟書教，無話今日之內要講完邊part,聽日要unit 2咁。
會鼓勵學生多發言，一開始上堂已經會叫同學分享下趣事，又會講下自己經歷。一開始我覺得自己英文底唔好，所以下下都要準備份槁先發言。後尾我落堂有同佢傾過計，加上班同學開左whatsapp group，知道大家水平相近，先主動開口講。
平易近人, 我有幾次落左堂留低問佢一啲問題，有時講講下變左吹水，有次吹水吹左八個字。
已讀即回，我次次inbox佢，半粒鐘以內即覆。有次send錯左想del，結果末del得切條信息，佢已經覆咗我。
上堂氣氛好，因為無見過佢鬧人。加上班上好少dead air, 因為熟落左已經唔係太介意準備，隨時可以freestyle咁講。
reviews.comment_grading:
1st Speaking task + 2 個reflection: 10% + 5%
Essay writing process + writing task: 15% + 30%
2nd speaking task: 20%
Vocabulary learning: 20%
無exam, quiz，全部可以準備，範圍無寫participation,所以我估應該無。
Speaking: 1st 3,2 2nd 4,4,4
Essay : process 3 , writing 3,4,4
Vocab : 4
估計有總分69.7%
係好fair,就算自我感覺良好加上佢有話你唔錯，最後成績一樣會落空。但因為係I班,俾太高就唔準，呢一科就無認受性。所以我認為可以接受。
reviews.comment_workload: 唔多，但係啲deadlines set得太集中，變相一係無功課，一係太多。

reviews.author: yin0612345
reviews.comment_content:
Mainly teach about speaking and writing
one writing task is about game changer
the second vocab test: require to remember 120 words
LANG class cannot skip class, you can only skip no more than three lessons and you also need to be very punctual.
reviews.comment_teaching:
He teaches quiet good
He provides many chances for me to talk English, and he gives feedback immediately.
reviews.comment_grading:
Fair.
LANG class usually C/D range.
reviews.comment_workload:
Depends.
I think high. I usually need three days to finish the writing task.
Two speaking test
Two writing test
Two vocab test
